message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value and I'm confident you'll find it worthwhile.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose $10,000 as the price for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
